name: Aisha Rahman
persona: Aisha is a dedicated Biochemistry major in her third year, known for her strong motivation to achieve high grades and her consistent study habits. She is highly organized, sets ambitious academic goals, and is persistent even when facing challenging coursework. While she sometimes experiences mild test anxiety, her self-discipline and confidence in her academic abilities help her perform well. Aisha balances her studies with extracurricular research, always striving to deepen her understanding and skills in her field.
